front.title: IEEE Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) is specified in the IEEE 1609 family of standards, within which a number of identifiers are used. This document describes the use of these identifiers, indicates identifier values that have been allocated for use by WAVE systems, and specifies the allocation of values of identifiers specified in the WAVE standards.
